exp.desc: Estimate the gold needed for Exp levelling

result.dm-only: To reduce spam message, you can only run this command in DM
result.bot-channel-only: To reduce spam message, you can only run this command in {CHANNEL} or DM

.<text>: With {EXP POINT} Exp points, you are at level __{CURR LEVEL}__.
Yu need about **{GOLD AMOUNT}M** gold to level up to __{NEXT LEVEL}__.
Note: this assumes that you get Exp points from 4-star troops packs only. In reality, you'd also get Exp points by other means.

result.you-are-close: You are at level {CURR LEVEL}, and you are very close to level {NEXT LEVEL}!
result.target-reached: You have already reached level {NEXT LEVEL}. Congratulation!

cmd-help.title: Estimate the gold needed for Exp levelling

<text>: **Estimating the gold needed for Exp levelling**
- Estimate the amount of gold needed to reach the next Exp level.
- Estimate the amount of gold needed to reach a target Exp level.
